ModMetadata.Name: ChangeStructuresAddon
ModMetadata.Author: Grilled_Salmon
ModMetadata.Description:
WARNING: This mod will not work, unless you install Stationeers.Addon mod loader. Read how to install it here: https://github.com/Erdroy/Stationeers.Addons ---
An addon that allows editing of Structure tool and material requirements via XML.
The default path for the XML file is below: Documents\My Games\Stationeers\mods\ChangeStructuresAddon\Content\StructureEdits.xml
An example XML file can be found in the workshop item folder at the following path: \steamapps\workshop\content\544550\2600483974\Content\StructureEdits.xml
NOTE: Upgrading of edited structures is limited to hosts in multiplayer, though other players can place the structure down and have the host upgrade it.
Source: https://github.com/grilled-salmon/Stationeers.ChangeStructuresAddon
